item.title: Is Intuitive Surgical the Hidden Winner in Healthcare’s Weakness?
item.description: Intuitive Surgical (NASDAQ: ISRG) trades 29% off its highs despite strong growth, leasing model expansion, and analyst targets calling for 40% upside.

item.title: Lithium Americas Stock Exploded Last Week—Here’s Why
item.description: This little-known lithium stock surged more than 151% last week. Despite those recent gains, it could still be undervalued.

item.title: Why Amazon’s Latest Upgrade Might Be Its Most Important Yet

item.title: October’s Top 5 Stocks Poised for Big Breakouts
item.description: September was a strong month for stocks, with many names moving higher on improved outlooks and positive analyst sentiment.

item.title: Is Tilray's Stock Price Surge a Pipe Dream of Political Hype?
item.description: Tilray's stock surge, fueled by political commentary and a technical squeeze, is now focusing market attention on its strong financial health.
